title: Social Engineering Penetration Test
description: A penetration tester is tasked with gaining a user's password through a vishing (voice phishing) phone call.

tasks.description: Conduct OSINT on a target employee to find their name, title, and department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester successfully gathers basic information about the target.

tasks.description: Call the target employee, impersonating a member of the IT help desk.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester successfully establishes a pretext for the call.

tasks.description: Convince the user that there is a problem with their account and that they need to provide their password to fix it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester successfully manipulates the user into revealing their password, achieving the test's objective.
